Experiencing	a	range	of	different	
positions and a variety of 
movement while awake is also 
good for a baby’s development.
Don’t let your baby get too 
hot	(or	too	cold)
Overheating can be dangerous. 
Babies can overheat because 
of too much bedding or 
clothing, or because the room 
is too hot. Remember, a folded 
blanket counts as two blankets. 
When you check your baby, 
make sure they are not too hot.
